import "../Cart/cartView.css"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import React, {useContext} from "react"; import { CartContext } from "../Store/CartContext"; import ItemCount from "../ItemCount/ItemCount"; const CartView = ({id, title, price, pictureUrl, quantity}) => { const {removeItem} = useContext(CartContext); return (

{title}

{quantity}

${price}

  PRODUCTO DESCRIPCIÓN PRECIO CANTIDAD SUBTOTAL

{title}

{price}

{quantity}

{{price} * {quantity}}

); } export default CartView;
